oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Iron catalysed nitrosation of olefins to oximes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, R
CHOWDHURY, AD
MAITI, D
LAHIRI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BECKMANN REARRANGEMENT
CYCLOHEXANONE OXIME
SODIUM-BOROHYDRIDE
NITRIC-OXIDE
REGIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
STYRENE DERIVATIVES
COBALT(II) COMPLEX
HYDROGEN-PEROXIDE
IONIC LIQUIDS
BUTYL NITRITE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fe(BF4)(2.)6H(2)O/2,6-pyridinedicarboxylic acid catalysed nitrosation of a wide variety of substituted styrenes has been developed in the presence of t-BuONO/NaBH4 under H-2 pressure (10 bar) in MeOH-H2O (5 : 1) to afford corresponding oximes in good to excellent yields.
